function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation rates may result in the spread of contagious diseases like tuberculosis, measles, and SARS-CoV-2 within built environments.","Impact":"Potential for transmission of infectious diseases and clusters of infected individuals.","Mitigation":"Ensure adequate ventilation rates per person, limit the number of people in poorly ventilated spaces, and consider opening windows as a preventive measure.","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, and air quality monitors.","People":"Occupants of commercial facilities and other buildings.","Owner":"Managers of commercial facilities, building owners, and public health authorities."}]}
